sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
If it is given that \(w : x :: y : z \), then prove that
\[
	\frac{4w + 7x }{4y + 7z } = \frac{4w - 7x }{4y - 7z }
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
It is given that
\[
	\frac{w }{x } = \frac{y }{z }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{4 \input[s1v1]{}}{7 x } = \frac{4 y }{7 \input[s1v2]{} }
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{4 \input[s2v1]{}+ 7 x }{4 w - 7 x } = \frac{4 \input[s2v2]{} + 7 z }{4 y - 7 z } \textrm{ {by componendo and dividendo}}
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{4 w + 7 x }{4 \input[s3v1]{} + 7 z } = \frac{4 w - 7 \input[s3v2]{} }{4 y - 7 z }
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": ["w", "z"], "text": "$$\text{"Upon Multiplying numerator and denominator by $4$ and $7$ respectively on both sides we get $\frac{4 w }{7 x } = \frac{4 y }{7 z }$}$$"}, {"data": ["w", "y"], "text": "$$\text{Applying componendo and dividendo rule, which states that if $ a:b :: c:d$, then $(a+b):(a-b)::(c+d):(c-d)$ to the previous equation, we get $\frac{4 w + 7 x }{4 w - 7 x } = \frac{4 y + 7 z }{4 y - 7 z }$}$$"}, {"data": ["y", "x"], "text": "$$\text{After multiplying the previous equation with $\frac{4 w - 7 x}{4 y + 7 z}$ we get, $\frac{4 w + 7 x }{4 y + 7 z } = \frac{4 w - 7 x }{4 y - 7 z}$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
